description:
GTK3 & python based GUI and notification area icon for [Syncthing](http://syncthing.net/), that is an open, trustworthy and decentralized syncing service.

Supported Syncthing features:

- Everything what WebUI can display
- Adding / editing / deleting nodes
- Adding / editing / deleting repositories
- Restart / shutdown server
- Editing daemon settings

Additional features:

- First run wizard for initial configuration
- Running Syncthing daemon in background
- Half-automatic setup for new nodes and repositories
- Desktop notifications
summary: GUI and notification area icon for Syncthing
author: syncthing, kozec
